data.title: Semasa Parking Sdn Bhd
data.text:
Biggest Asset Owned Car Park Operator

We Managed A Total Of 17,377 Carpark Bays

Managing, Maintaining And Providing Security Services And Car Parks

About Us

SEMASA PARKING, was incorporated in 2006 and specializes in Parking Operation & Management Services. Our customers range from commercial office, shopping mall, residential/hotel and mixed-use especially within the exclusive urban business center/transportation hub such as Kuala Lumpur Sentral, PJ Sentral and Penang Sentral. We are a wholly owned subsidiary of Malaysian Resources Corporation Berhad(“MRCB”). We are also an ISO 9001:2015 certified company.

VISION

To be the most preferred parking operator and provider of complete parking solutions, to meet customers’ expectations every day.

MISSION

To deliver quality services to clients and users with innovative customer focused products incorporating the latest technologies.

To ensure the utmost convenience, safety, and hospitality levels, meeting users’ needs.

QUALITY POLICY

At Semasa Parking, we are wholly committed to satisfying customers’ and Stakeholders’ through consistent fulfillment of the following:

Responsive, efficient, and reliable services.

Compliance with commitments made including the requirements of regulatory authorities and standards.

Continual improvements of our services, people, and quality management system

TERMS & CONDITIONS OF SEASON PARKING

Users shall use the carpark at their own risk and hereby exempt Semasa Parking Sdn Bhd (“the Company”), its agents and servants from liability of any kind resulting from any accident, damage or injury to person or for any loss resulting from theft or damage to property occurring within the carpark which is not directly caused by the negligence of the Company.

Career

To assist the car park supervisor in day-to-day management of parking site facilities

Requirements

Malaysian

Male candidate is preferred

Can work on a shift basis

Good health condition
